00025 
00026 // main system configuration
00027 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00028 // start the session
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00030 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00031 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/template_parser/simbio_template_parser.inc.php';
00032 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00033 
00034 // privileges checking
00035 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('system', 'r');
00036 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('system', 'w');
00037 
00038 if (!$can_read) {
00039     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to view this section').'</div>');
00040 }
00041 
00042 $max_print = 50;
00043 
00044 // barcode pdf download
00045 if (isset($_SESSION['barcodes'])) {
00046     // include printed settings configuration file
00047     require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'admin_template'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'printed_settings.inc.php';
00048     // check for custom template settings
00049     $custom_settings = SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$sysconf['template']['theme'].DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'printed_settings.inc.php';
00050     if (file_exists($custom_settings)) {
00051         include $custom_settings;
00052     }
00053     // chunk barcode array
00054     $chunked_barcode_arrays = array_chunk($_SESSION['barcodes'], $items_per_row);
00055     // create html ouput
00056     $html_str = '<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">'."\n";
00057     $html_str .= '<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><head><title>Document Label Print Result</title>'."\n";
00058     $html_str .= '<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />'."\n";
00059     $html_str .= '<style type="text/css">'."\n";
00060     $html_str .= 'body { padding: 0; overflow: auto; }'."\n";
00061     $html_str .= '.labelStyle { text-align: center; float: left; margin: '.$barcodegen_items_margin.'cm; border: '.($barcodegen_include_border>0?$barcodegen_include_border:0).'px solid #000000; }'."\n";
00062     $html_str .= '</style>'."\n";
00063     $html_str .= '</head>'."\n";
00064     $html_str .= '<body>'."\n";
00065     // loop the chunked arrays to row
00066     foreach ($chunked_barcode_arrays as $barcode_rows) {
00067         $html_str .= '<div style="clear: both;">';
00068         foreach ($barcode_rows as $barcode) {
00069             $html_str .= '<div class="labelStyle">';
00070             $html_str .= '<img src="'.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'images/barcodes/'.str_replace(array(' '), '_', $barcode).'.png" style="width: 90%" border="0" />';
00071             $html_str .= '</div>';
00072         }
00073         $html_str .= '</div>';
00074     }
00075     $html_str .= '<script type="text/javascript">self.print();</script>'."\n";
00076     $html_str .= '</body></html>'."\n";
00077     // unset the session
00078     unset($_SESSION['barcodes']);
00079     // write to file
00080     $file_write = @file_put_contents(FILES_UPLOAD_DIR.'barcode_gen_print_result.html', $html_str);
00081     if ($file_write) {
00082         // open result in window
00083         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.openWin(\''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.FILES_DIR.'/barcode_gen_print_result.html\', \'popBarcodeGen\', 800, 500, true)</script>';
00084     } else { utility::jsAlert('ERROR! Barcodes failed to generate, possibly because '.SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.FILES_DIR.' directory is not writable'); }
00085     exit();
00086 }
00087 
00088 // barcodes generator proccess
00089 if (isset($_POST['saveData']) AND $can_write) {
00090     if (count($_POST['barcode']) > 0) {
00091         $size = intval($_POST['size']);
00092         // create AJAX request
00093         echo '<script type="text/javascript" src="'.JS_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'prototype.js"></script>';
00094         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00095         foreach ($_POST['barcode'] as $barcode_text) {
00096             if (!empty($barcode_text)) {
00097                 $barcode_text = trim($barcode_text);
00098                 echo 'new Ajax.Request(\''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'lib/phpbarcode/barcode.php?code='.$barcode_text.'&encoding='.$sysconf['barcode_encoding'].'&scale='.$size.'&mode=png\', { method: \'get\', onFailure: function(sendAlert) { alert(\''.__('Error creating barcode!').'\'); } });'."\n";
00099                 // add to sessions
00100                 $_SESSION['barcodes'][] = $barcode_text;
00101             }
00102         }
00103         echo 'alert(\''.__('Barcode generation finished').'\')'."\n";
00104         echo 'location.href = \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'\''."\n";
00105         echo '</script>';
00106     }
00107     exit();
00108 }

00113     <?php echo strtoupper(__('Barcode Generator')).' <hr />' . __('Type barcodes text to one or more text field below and click'). ' "' .__('Generate Barcodes'). '".'; ?>

00118 // create table object
00119 $table = new simbio_table();
00120 $table->table_attr = 'align="center" class="border fullWidth" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00121 
00122 // initial row count
00123 $row = 1;
00124 $row_num = 6;
00125 
00126 // submit button
00127 $table->appendTableRow(array(__('Barcode Size').' : <select name="size"><option value="1">'.__('Small').'</option>
00128     <option value="2" selected>'.__('Medium').'</option>
00129     <option value="3">'.__('Big').'</option></select>'));
00130 // set cell attribute
00131 $table->setCellAttr($row, 0, 'colspan="3" class="alterCell"');
00132 $row++;
00133 
00134 // barcode text fields
00135 while ($row <= $row_num) {
00136     $table->appendTableRow(array('<input type="text" name="barcode[]" style="width: 100%;" />',
00137         '<input type="text" name="barcode[]" style="width: 100%;" />',
00138         '<input type="text" name="barcode[]" style="width: 100%;" />'));
00139     $row++;
00140 }
00141 
00142 // submit button
00143 $table->appendTableRow(array('<input type="submit" name="saveData" value="'.__('Generate Barcodes').'" />'));
00144 // set cell attribute
00145 $table->setCellAttr($row_num+1, 0, 'colspan="3" class="alterCell"');
00146 
00147 echo '<form name="barcodeForm" id="barcodeForm" target="submitExec" method="post" action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'">';
00148 echo $table->printTable();
00149 echo '</form>';
00150 // for debugging purpose only
00151 // echo '<iframe name="submitExec" id="submitExec" style="width: 100%; height: 200px; visibility: visible;"></iframe>';
00152 echo '<iframe name="submitExec" id="submitExec" style="width: 0; height: 0; visibility: hidden;"></iframe>';
00153 ?>
